articles.title: Dow Set to Open Down as Trump Tariff Threats Hit Nvidia-Led Market Rally - Barron's
articles.description: Dow and S&P 500 futures are falling in premarket trading, the Nasdaq 100 is edging up. An Nvidia-led rally fades as the stock market reacts to President Donald Trump threating a 50% tariff on goods from Brazil.
articles.content: U.S. stock futures were mostly pointing to losses at the market open on Thursday, as President Donald Trumps latest tariff announcements threatened to pour cold water on the previous days Nvidia-led … [+1506 chars]

articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: Delta cuts 2025 profit outlook, but CEO says demand has stabilized - CNBC
articles.description: Delta cut its 2025 forecast after tariffs and hesitant consumers hit the brakes on trips this year.
articles.content:
Delta Air Lines reinstated its 2025 profit outlook Thursday and said it expects a stronger outlook for summer travel than Wall Street anticipated.
Bookings have stabilized after months of lower-than… [+3442 chars]

articles.title: Kerr County struggled to fund flood warnings. Under Trump, it's getting even harder - NPR
articles.description: Kerr County applied for federal grants to build a warning system to protect residents from flash floods. Under the Trump administration, that kind of funding is drying up.
articles.content: Years before the flooding took more than 90 lives in Kerr County, Texas, local officials knew residents faced threats from rapidly rising water. They started planning a flood warning system, one that… [+9350 chars]
